cards.name: Colossal Strike
cards.description:
Deal 11 (14) damage
to ALL enemies.
If you kobeRed:Possess more cards than you kobered:Own, attack again.

cards.name: Defiant
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
The next time you are
attacked this turn,
gain 6 (8) Block again.

cards.name: Traumatize
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Add 1 Flashback on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Unleash
cards.description:
Add Ascender's Bane into your hand.
Deal 5 (7) damage for each unique Curse you kobeRed:Possess.

cards.name: Armor of Pain
cards.description:
Gain 14 (17) Block.
The next time you are attacked this turn, lose 4 HP.

cards.name: Bloodbath
cards.description:
Add 2 Slimed
into your hand.
Gain [R] [R] ([R]).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bravado
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
If it is Upgraded,
gain 1 (2) Strength.

cards.name: Frenzy
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards and randomize their cost until the end of
this turn.

cards.name: Hotheaded
cards.description:
Draw up to 4 (6) cards
until the total cost
of the drawn cards
reaches 3.

cards.name: Infect
cards.description:
Add 1 Void
into your hand.
Deal 5 (7) damage for each unique Status you kobeRed:Possess.

cards.name: Scab Scale
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you lose HP, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Cautery
cards.description:
Add 1 Burn~~- + -~~  into
your discard pile.
Gain 5 Regen.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Look at the top 3 cards of your draw pile and Exhaust 2 of them. Exhaust.

cards.name: Power Trip
cards.description:
Whenever you apply
Vulnerable or Weak
to an enemy,
gain 3 (4) Vigor.

cards.name: Seize
cards.description:
Deal 15 (20) damage.
Choose 1 of 3
non-Red Rare cards
to add on top of your
draw pile. Exhaust.

cards.name: Flashback
cards.description:
Retain.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

keywords.name: Own
keywords.description: A card is owned if your master deck contains it.

keywords.name: Possess
keywords.description: A card is possessed if it is in your hand, draw pile or discard pile.
